original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽9.5. Hetuduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  hetu duka sani dassana ttika
translated: The Chapter on the Opposite of Ideas, the Triad on Conditions, the Text on the Paṭṭhāna

original: nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca🔽nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca
analyzed: na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigha  dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca  na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca  nana hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭighañca na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭighañca
translated: A state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, arises in dependence on a root cause condition.🔽A state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, arises in dependence on a state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement.🔽A state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, arises in dependence on a state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, and on a state that is a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement.🔽A state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, arises in dependence on a state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, and on a state that is a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement.🔽A state that is a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, arises in dependence on a state that is not a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement, and on a state that is a root cause, that is not a visible form, that has impingement.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: A state that is not a condition and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object arises by root-cause condition. A state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object, and a state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object arise by root-cause condition. A state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object, and a state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object arise by root-cause condition. A state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object arises by root-cause condition. A state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object arises by root-cause condition. A state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object, and a state that is not a root-cause and is not an object-condition and is not a supporting object arise by root-cause condition.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
translated: Nine dhammas arise with non-volitional formations as condition. (Abbreviated.)🔽With a root cause as condition, nine … (All nine sections in the first triad are to be expanded in the same way as §1.)

original: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: With a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction as condition, a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction …🔽With a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction as condition, a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction …

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu
translated: With a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction as condition, a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction and a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction arise.

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  nana hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction as condition, a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction …

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu
translated: With a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction as condition, a non-root cause and a non-object-of-consciousness and an obstruction …

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigha
translated: A state that is not-inconstant and has impingement arises with a condition that is a root-cause.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement as condition, a state that is not a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement …

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: A state that is not a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement arises with a condition that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement.

original: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham ca na na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement as condition, a state that is not a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement …

original: nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca
analyzed: na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham ca
translated: A state that is not a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement arises with a condition that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement.

original: nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: nana hetum na a nidassana sa paṭighañca dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭighañca na na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭighañca  dhammam paṭicca na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement as condition, a state that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement …🔽A state that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement arises with a condition that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement.🔽With a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement as condition, a state that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement …🔽A state that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement arises with a condition that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement as condition, a state that is not a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement and a state that is a root-cause and not-inconstant and has impingement arise.🔽(In brief)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sahajāta vāre pi pe sampayutta vāre pi sabbattha vitthāro
translated: With cause as condition: nine … non-obstructing: nine. (In the section on conascence, etc., the method should be understood in detail in the same way.)

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa🔽Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa  nana hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ nana hetussa na a nidassana sa paṭighassa dhammassa
translated: With cause as condition and object:🔽A state with multiple causes and multiple objects is a condition, by way of condition being through cause, for a state with multiple causes and multiple objects.

original: hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa🔽dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na a nidassana sa paṭighassa  dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa
translated: A state with multiple causes and multiple objects is a condition, by way of condition being through cause, for a state without cause and multiple objects.

original: naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighassa ca na na hetussa na anidassana sappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ
translated: A state with multiple causes and multiple objects is a condition, by way of condition being through cause, for a state without cause and multiple objects and for a state with multiple causes and multiple objects.

original: Nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na anidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta
translated: A state without cause and multiple objects is a condition, by way of object condition, for a state without cause and multiple objects. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava pe upanissaye nava purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane
translated: With cause as condition: three. With object as condition: nine … With decisive support as condition: nine. With prior condition: three. With subsequent condition: three. With nutriment as condition: three.

original: nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte
analyzed: nava kamme tīṇi vipāke nava āhāre tīṇi indriye nava jhāne tīṇi magge sampayutte
translated: Nine, in path …🔽Nine, in association …🔽Five, in dissociation …🔽Nine, in absence …🔽Nine, in non-adversion …

original: nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Pañhāvāraṁ evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)🔽Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: nava vippayutte pañca pe avigate nava pañhāvāram evam vitthāretabba  na hetum na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: Nine, in root …🔽Nine, in condition …🔽Nine, in non-culmination …🔽Nine, in non-defeat …🔽Nine, in non-disappearance …

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme …pe… magge ekaṁ, vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
